name: EZ Long Drive
additionalNotes: This is a new brand from Eddy Zarzela and Felix Rodriguez, they bring 25 years of manufacturing experience in premium brands such as "A. Fuente" and "La Gloria Cubana". This Dominican Cigar features a Connecticut Wrapper along with Dominican Binder and Filler. Mild and Creamy with a roasted nut finish makes this cigar a must have.
